The expert confirms that D: A.R.E. has never listed so-called "gateway drugs" and has not removed cannabis from any such list.
The expert mentions that in 2016: some news outlets reported that D.A.R.E. had delisted cannabis as a gateway drug, referring to a Teen Vogue story and a Reddit post.
The expert highlights that the D: A.R.E. website page on keeping kids drug-free does not mention cannabis as a gateway drug, only referencing it in relation to tobacco use.
The expert acknowledges that the D: A.R.E. website page, which previously mentioned the potential for cannabis to lead to the use of other drugs, has been removed, indicating a change in the curriculum's approach.
